title: A Zombie's Guide to Being Dead
description: Are you or a loved one a zombie? Are you finding it hard to cope with missing limbs and aimless wandering? Do you need help figuring out what to do with your afterlife?With BRUUUGGGHHHHH's tried and tested techniques, not only can you have the afterlife that you deserve, but you can also learn to enjoy the ride.~BRUUUGGGHHHHH is a new author and zombie, committed to bringing her fail proof techniques from the afterlife to the zombies in your life."A wonderful insight into the minds of the undead and the daily struggles that they have to overcome." -H.A. Kinani
author: BRUUUGGGHHHHH
